qas.question: What modern technologies were first used during the Crimean War?

answers.text: explosive naval shells, railways, and telegraphs

qas.question: Who was recognized for treating the wounded while pioneering modern nursing?
The war was one of the first to be documented in what two ways?

context: The Crimean War was one of the first conflicts to use modern technologies such as <a0_0>explosive naval shells, railways, and telegraphs<a0_0/>.(Preface) The war was one of the first to be documented extensively in <a2_0>written reports and photographs<a2_0/>. As the legend of the "Charge of the Light Brigade" demonstrates, the war quickly became an iconic symbol of logistical, medical and tactical failures and mismanagement. The reaction in the UK was a demand for professionalization, most famously achieved by <a1_0>Florence Nightingale<a1_0/>, who gained worldwide attention for pioneering modern nursing while treating the wounded.
